comments.text:
User Agent: Opera/9.80 (X11; Linux x86_64; U; ru) Presto/2.9.168 Version/11.50

Steps to reproduce:

>>> Compiling source in /var/tmp/portage/dev-java/jss-4.3/work/mozilla ...
make -j4 -j1 BUILD_OPT=1 
../coreconf/config.mk:71: ../coreconf/Linux3.0.mk: No such file or directory
make: *** No rule to make target ../coreconf/Linux3.0.mk.  Stop.
make: *** [../coreconf/Linux3.0.mk] Error 1
